author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
It's that time again! In this live stream, Adam will be answering questions from Tested members about anything and everything. Note that during live streams, Tested memberships are gifted. Be sure you're signed into your YouTube account and you've opted to receive gifted memberships! YouTube randomly assigns gifts to people logged in and watching.  Instructions are on this page (https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/6304294 -- just scroll to "opt in and get gifted memberships."  Join this channel to support Tested and get access to perks, like asking Adam questions: 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiDJtJKMICpb9B1qf7qjEOA/join]

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

Join this channel to support Tested and get access to perks:

Savage Merchan
title: Adam Savage's Live Streams: Tuesday, Sept. 30, at 10 am PT

author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
While visiting with their Star Trek Klingon Battlecruiser model, TOMY's Crhsi Huisman also shows us the prototype for their new 1:10 scale replica of KITT from Knight Rider! Scaled in line with their DeLorean replica they released last year, this is also a diecast model with light, sound, and an interactive transformation feature that puts KITT in Super Pursuit Mode as seen on the show!

Find out more about the TOMY KITT model: https://www.backerkit.com/c/projects/tomy-plus/1-10-kitt-knight-rider

Shot by Josh Self and edited by Norman Chan
Music by Jinglepunks

title: This KITT From Knight Rider Actually Transforms!
